name: Snacave
description:
Classic game in another view. Collect apples, avoid walls and your tail, catch strange cave inhabitants, relax and have fun)

Controls:

W / UP - speed up
A / LEFT - turn left, counterclockwise
D / RIGHT - turn right, clockwise

Some lags appear from time to time in web version, so check out windows one. 

This game was made for Summer Slow Jams July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games #summerslowjams .
